mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(JUMDATE, 'YYYYMM') MONTH, SUM(J.JUMCNT) CNT FROM JUMUN J, (SELECT JP.SANGPGNUM SANGPGNUM, SANGNAME NAME FROM JUMUNPAGE JP, PRODUCT P WHERE JP.SANGCODE = P.SANGCODE) SA WHERE SA.SANGPGNUM = J.SANGPGNUM AND TO_CHAR(JUMDATE, 'YYYY') = #{year} AND SA.NAME = #{sangname} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(JUMDATE, 'YYYYMM')
